entities.description: Justin is mentioned as having told Potter that he was Muggle-born.

entities.name: eton
entities.description: Eton is mentioned as a school that Justin said Potter had been down for.

entities.name: ernie
entities.description: Ernie is mentioned as suspecting Potter of being a dark wizard.

entities.name: hannah
entities.description: Hannah is mentioned as anxiously asking Ernie if he thinks Potter is the one.

entities.name: parsecmouth
entities.description: Parselmouth is mentioned as a trait that dark wizards have.

relationships.description: Ernie suspects Potter of being a dark wizard.
Hannah inquires about whether Ernie thinks Potter is the one.
Justin reveals a secret to Potter that he was Muggle-born.
Ernie associates Parselmouth with dark wizards.
